website_summaries.verdict: The best budget diversion safe that can be used both indoors and outside.
pros: Real functioning bolt with a removable washer and nut
Bolt stem hides small items like cash and papers
Good to keep around the garage or outside
cons: Too small for most larger valuable items

customer_reviews.title: it's a cool little hiding place
customer_reviews.text: This hefty safe is a genuine bolt that's hollow. It's a slick way to hide your stash. Unfortunately, it's too shallow to hold a rolled up bill. The bill would have to be folded first. This annoys me (just a little) because the seller's images show a rolled up bill. It's barely tall enough for a matchstick. The inner compartment is not as long as the bolt. Other than that, it's a cool little hiding place. You'd never know it was hollow when holding it; it has a nice weight and feel to it.
customer_reviews.author: OregoniansTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: It's fine, I guess.
customer_reviews.text: The entire thing (appropriately?) is kind of slimy with oil. I guess that makes it more authentic? More rust-resistant? Still, it wasn't my favorite smell / thing to get on my shirt. My main beef is with the threads: they don't work well. The threads on the cap and the threads on the "bolt" part don't join up very well, so getting the cap on straight is kind of tricky. It also immediately let me know how they made it (and how quickly). I mean it's fine for what I bought it for (a treasure hunt), but it's not great.
customer_reviews.author: Adam H

customer_reviews.title: Picture shows cash being hidden, but there is not room.
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be a very cool hiding place...but totally disappointed when it turns out you can't even fit dollar bills. Especially since the listing shows a picture of cash being hidden in it. very misleading.
customer_reviews.author: NEX

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very cool but I wanted to show how big it is. Almost too big to be inconspicuous .
customer_reviews.author: Bo

customer_reviews.title: It's made well it's just so freaking huge looks like a novelty item it wouldn't take a genius to become suspicious immediately l
customer_reviews.text: It's well made it's heavy too bad it's so ridiculously huge unless you are diesel mechanic the size alone would cause someone to look at it and play around with it it's not very diversionary at all it's made of metal that's cool but it's so freaking huge it looks like a novelty item so no this is not a very good place to stash your money Etc unless you're like I said a diesel mechanic and carry around large bolts and tools.
customer_reviews.author: Remjob

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know who said you couldn't add anything bigger than a single aspirin in it... Unless they're smuggling extra giant horse tranquilizer pills...? Easily stash several pills in it ... Just to be sure I tried it. I was able to randomly toss in 17 orange OTC Motrin's to be sure. It has white pvc like pipe inside of it so it's pretty secure as far as I can tell. It's for small items. If you need something larger go for the Aquafina bottle! It's secure, and way bigger than I thought it would be. Tossed it in a tool bag and it went invisible real quick. I love this thing.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Lies!
customer_reviews.text: I want to love this product, but the fact that I can't hide a dollar bill in it is a big miss in my opinion, this clever product is short of this measurement by only a 1/4" However if your contents to be hidden doesn't require these specifications it's a very sneaky hiding place. Would have given 3 or 4 stars due to this product not being a right for for me, but you literally have a photo of money sticking out of the bolt which is misleading. 0 stars for the lie.
customer_reviews.author: James Bishop

customer_reviews.title: As described, be aware of the dimensions... it is large
customer_reviews.text: This is a real nut & bolt that has been machined to allow the head of the bolt to be unscrewed, revealing a machined-out shaft capable of storing small items; like some emergency cash in the form of a paper bill. Note that this is a LARGE item, not something you can just throw in your junk drawer with out it looking out of place. I would recommend you putting it in the garage along with maybe some larger equipment so it doesn't look out of place.
customer_reviews.author: BWMeeks

customer_reviews.title: Great hidey hole
customer_reviews.text: Looks just like a nut and bolt. Inside is lined with what looks like stainless steel. Not very big area, you could fit a couple Bill's in there th m but they'd have to be folded pretty small
customer_reviews.author: DMT Productions

customer_reviews.title: Real Deal Solid Nut & Bolt!
customer_reviews.text: It’s made of solid materials. It’s real deal nut & bolt. My only negative thing I would say is it’s very big so I unless you have a work truck or contractor background it would stick out in a regular car (ain’t hiding it). Perfect if you have tools or truck with screws, nuts, & bolts laying around!!
customer_reviews.author: S Perry

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool container!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift. Its very sturdy construction and you legitimately would not know this was not an actual bolt unless you owned it. Its as heavy as you would imagine this size of bolt to be and the cavity is a generous size!
customer_reviews.author: firemedic2008

customer_reviews.title: Awesome unl
customer_reviews.text: Awesome idea sturdy heavy but what a$$h##e decided to show money in this thing when it doesnt even fit i mean every bill has been the same size dor a long time probably since abe lincoln drew a picture of george Washington on the 1dollar bill
customer_reviews.author: Random guy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Looks exactly like a bolt with a washer and nut on it. I leave sitting in the open and it goes unnoticed in my atmosphere. Tighten the lid then tighten the nut up by hand and you'll nearly need tools to loosen it.
customer_reviews.author: Radio

customer_reviews.title: Made a nice gift for someone who was difficult to buy for
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift, and they were pleased. As others have noted the chamber is rather small which limits it's utility but was well made.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Tanner

customer_reviews.title: Too big, looks odd.
customer_reviews.text: Problem is it's just way too big and looks out of place even in a toolbox. If you can find a place to screw this into something that blends in with other large heavy bolts or mix it in with huge bolts it will probably work.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: this is good for your garage
customer_reviews.text: does the job, it'll hold several bills, medicine etc. it's quite large. this is good for your garage.
customer_reviews.author: Sir Lancelot

customer_reviews.title: Looks very real
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to hide something, it's great, but wouldn't want to travel with it, unless your a traveling mechanic. Lol
customer_reviews.author: DC MPLS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This looks and feels like a real bolt abs nut. I would suggest this to anyone in need of a little cubby hole.
customer_reviews.author: Crazy Carl

customer_reviews.title: Looks and feels the part!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! But I added a gasket to make it air and water tight.
customer_reviews.author: kayla rigole

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad.
customer_reviews.text: This bolt safe does not have a lot of room but that is understandable. If it did have a lot of storage room then the bolt would have to be huge, and that would make it noticeable. You should go to the hardware store and buys some more bolts like this one, and it will be hidden quite nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I gave these to my nephews with money inside for ...
customer_reviews.text: I gave these to my nephews with money inside for Christmas. They were definitely a hit, although they are slightly shorter that a rolled bill, so I kinda had to squish the edge of the bill in the tube.
customer_reviews.author: P. Herston

customer_reviews.title: Our key did not fit inside this item
customer_reviews.text: The key we wanted to place inside this item has a rather wide "head" and would not fit into the item. We threw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great hiding place
customer_reviews.text: This is a big nut and bolt that is hollowed out for secret storage. Rolled up bills fit nicely!
customer_reviews.author: Jakson

customer_reviews.title: Cool concept but covered in rust and oil can’t just clean
customer_reviews.text: Covered in rust and oil. Got on my hands and clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Great gift.
customer_reviews.text: Hid a $50 for my niece’s 16th birthday. She was scratching her head the whole day. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MDH

customer_reviews.title: Decent price for a very cool product.
customer_reviews.text: Cool little stash. No one would ever think to look in it.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Brown

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are the real deal....they look realistic in looks and weight.....heavy!! The but and spacer even spin off.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Really cool niche item
customer_reviews.text: Really cool niche item, looks real as a gave it for a gift and took the recipient multiple days and hints to figure out. You will have to do some creative folding if you wish to stash cash, but it is possible.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Stealth = 100
customer_reviews.text: Nobody is going to check the nasty rusted bolt in the junk pile for my house key.
customer_reviews.author: Dunning-Kruger

customer_reviews.title: BS
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why these came, but they did. Purchased product not included.
customer_reviews.author: Krista Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: Real feel and look
customer_reviews.text: Great hard to tell it's not real definitely will buy more
customer_reviews.author: joshua johnson

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: its good for hiding somethings. and hopefully most people will over look it. but if you got your hand on it, it is very easy to figure out how to open.
customer_reviews.author: neal

customer_reviews.title: This is just like a real bolt
customer_reviews.text: This is just like a real bolt, nut and washer. Very heavy. This would not look suspicious on a semi. I am not quite sure where I could "hide" it. It is fun and fascinating to share and play with!
customer_reviews.author: LuAnn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. I would recommend washing them before using them though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unreal
customer_reviews.text: Hide cash in it throw it in your tool box the wife will never find it
customer_reviews.author: Paul K.

customer_reviews.title: •
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. The only problem is that it sticks out due to its finish being shiny and new. A wire wheel and some ice melt gave it a less conspicuous look
customer_reviews.author: C.R

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy This WITHOUT READING REVIEWS!
customer_reviews.text: Simple and dumb. It's going back. The ad shows a rolled up bill. This image shows: 1. The thing was made from a real bolt; and, 2. The ad here on Amazon shows a bill rolled up just like this - implying that the 'safe' could hold bills; and, 3. It cannot hold rolled-up bills because they missed the depth they needed to make this a worthwhile device. This is right out of every dumb crook movie, ever. The picture shows ten bills rolled up together. At the most, if the safe had been built to ACTUALLY HOLD U.S. Currency - the most that it could hold is one thousand dollars. Don't be fooled like I was.
customer_reviews.author: Former Rater

customer_reviews.title: Great great quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, excellent quality, blends right into the work bench! Filled with hundreds, and never would one even think anything of it!
customer_reviews.author: MD Ulery

customer_reviews.title: Its good
customer_reviews.text: Its really nice. I bought serval different types and this one is one of the stronest and toughness.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Belcher

customer_reviews.title: Heavy
customer_reviews.text: It's a little bigger then I expected but we love it

customer_reviews.title: Good stealthy
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Throw it in the trunk and poooooof
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Realistic, But Doesn't Hold US Currency
customer_reviews.text: The style and texture of this safe is great! Trust me, no one is going to fiddle with it or even begin to think it is fake. BUT - there is one problem - the storage compartment isn't long enough to hold the width of US currency. It would be SO much better if you could hide money in.
customer_reviews.author: AndrewB

customer_reviews.title: horrible
customer_reviews.text: did not come with all the parts. could hide anything in it

customer_reviews.title: Really clever idea to conceal smaller items. The bolt ...
customer_reviews.text: Really clever idea to conceal smaller items. The bolt has weight to it so as long as the contents inside don't shake, nobody would be able to tell it apart from another bolt -- at least compared to a bolt with similar dimensions. Can also use it as a bolt if you want.

customer_reviews.title: Great bolt safe.
customer_reviews.text: Great bolt safe. The inner plastic insert was cut unevenly and did not even reach the top of the bolt and this is my only complaint.

customer_reviews.title: I liked this better than I thought I would
customer_reviews.text: I liked this better than I thought I would. It really DOES look real and it was a great gift

customer_reviews.title: Very realistic
customer_reviews.text: So pleased with this product. It is *heavy* so if you hope it feels like a real nut and bolt, it does. It even sounds like a real bolt when you unscrew the large nut or even just drop it.
customer_reviews.author: David Ferrier

customer_reviews.title: Gotta be the ultimate in hiding stuff. Put a ...
customer_reviews.text: Gotta be the ultimate in hiding stuff. Put a o-ring around the cap and drop it in a tub with a kerosene (or some other solvent) and a bunch of other bolts and you've got the ultimate hiding place. Not even the dogs could find it.
customer_reviews.author: The Rabble

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: too small to do anything with it. Product arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: Pauly

customer_reviews.title: Matches with the rest like it in the junk drawer....perfect
customer_reviews.text: Works just like they describe and was delivered on time.....yes I would recommend to a friend except then they would know what to look for
customer_reviews.author: J. Apland

customer_reviews.title: Awsome not perfect
customer_reviews.text: Awsome little safe only thing is if it were half an inch or so longer you could for a few rolled up dollar bills inside (see pics)
customer_reviews.author: Sam Farmer

customer_reviews.title: its an ok item
customer_reviews.text: +4 stars for prompt shipping and affordability overall good customer experience. Wasn't 100% satisfied with the item itself, -1 star based on how it feels when handled because in my opinion mine had an almost chalky texture as if the manufacturer was going for an imitation of an aged / weathered bolt? Its not how I expected it to feel based on looks. Also the weight of it seems slightly unrealistic on the lighter side in my opinion. Returned it today but in general decent item. If I decided to get another one I'd prefer a smaller version of this its pretty large.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worthless for money
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping that I could roll up about 10 hundred dollar bills and insert it inside. However, the bold compartment inside is one half of an inch too small for you to simply roll even one bill and put inside. So if you are looking for something to hide money in find something else. Maybe it would be good to hide diamonds or drugs in, but I don't know about these items.
customer_reviews.author: Lester W.

customer_reviews.title: OMG
customer_reviews.text: This is genius! If you invented and crafted these you should get rich. You deserve it. Didn't leave out any detail. Made it dirty as well! Ha. Too funny. I love it. I just hope no one wants to steal it because it's cool just being a giant bolt. Ty
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Larr

customer_reviews.title: What a great deal. You could fit a roll of bills ...
customer_reviews.text: I did not expect this to be so large. What a great deal. You could fit a roll of bills and here easily. I should have looked at the pictures to get a idea of the size. You could put it in a toolbox and no one would suspect for a minute that this was a Secret Safe. It is extremely heavy. Just like a real Bolt.
customer_reviews.author: SiaSynn

customer_reviews.title: Well made. Heavy enough to be believable. Large enough to hold cash.
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for anyone who needs to keep little things hidden. Looks real enough to throw into a tool box or trunk and never be noticed by a person looking to take something.You can easily roll up a large bill and keep it in here for an emergency. Our friend keeps his blood pressure meds in his desk at work
customer_reviews.author: M.L. Prusha

customer_reviews.title: Puzzled
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a wedding gift...I placed money in it with a note attached that read "Now you are bolted together!" The groom looked at me with a puzzled looked, laughed at the note, and thought it was a four wheeler part. When I explained how to open it and what it was everyone thought it was cool.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta Moody

customer_reviews.title: Bear in mind it does have some weight to it ...
customer_reviews.text: Bear in mind it does have some weight to it, but will look ordinary in a stash of other hardware or such. So weight and you may need to oil it because it looks it will rust over time. I will not buy another because of this compared to the amount of space you get for your stash.
customer_reviews.author: Cinnamon

customer_reviews.title: Looks and feels like a real bolt!
customer_reviews.text: What a neat thing! I can fit several bills in it and it looks and feels like a real bolt. I'm a retired mechanic and thought there's no way this could ever fool me. Surprise! Cool item!
customer_reviews.author: zoombabee

customer_reviews.title: Surprised
customer_reviews.text: Was surprised at how nice this thing is. The workmanship is excellent. Very Very happy with this purchase even tho it's just a big bolt with a hidden compartment. Fast shipping. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super slick stash items & I've used many
customer_reviews.text: Super slick stash items & I've used many. Large, worn looking, easy to clean, open, load & close. Great to throw under the seat of your car! Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: There is a smaller version of this.......
customer_reviews.text: Just a bit large to have a place in a typical household that would allow it to "blend". Perhaps if you're a high steel worker.....

customer_reviews.title: Hardly anyone knows this is fake which is perfect. Anyone looking to hide something or for an ...

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT

customer_reviews.title: Suggestions for an improved Bolt Safe -
customer_reviews.text: It would be preferable if the nut head had reverse threading in addition to an O - ring for a water proof seal. All else considered, it's well made.

customer_reviews.title: Awsome
customer_reviews.text: Excellent stash, plenty of room. Looks and feels like a regular bolt.

customer_reviews.title: Cool idea
customer_reviews.text: Cool idea, big bolt small storage space. I've used it to Hide keys in a place that blends in well.

customer_reviews.title: Cant be to safe
customer_reviews.text: This one of the best safes I've seen. Will order more for friends.

customer_reviews.text: Tossed in with other hardware, this thing becomes invisible. The inside is lined with white plastic. I am adding a rubber gasket to make it waterproof. Great stash...

customer_reviews.title: Looks and feels great just very disappointed that it shows a picture of ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks and feels great just very disappointed that it shows a picture of rolled up U.S. currency going into it but it doesn't fit. If you are using it for other reasons then its a great product

customer_reviews.text: Wish we weren't being so public here but it is GREAT!

customer_reviews.title: Never lose my stash again unless somebody scraps it
customer_reviews.text: It was the perfect size to put what I needed inside of it also I work construction so it's with my other parts and pieces quite well

customer_reviews.title: great little hiding spot

customer_reviews.title: I recommend it
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not what I expected it feels and looks real and has a good amount of space in it I actually think it's the coolest thing ever

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift and was scared it wouldn't be realistic. It was bigger than I imagined and heavy. It was exactly like a real bolt. I loved it!

customer_reviews.title: These bolts look about the size for a semi. ...
customer_reviews.text: These bolts look about the size for a semi. The weight is heavy enough that when I tossed it at my husband, he had no clue what it was. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: gary griffin

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than expected (giggity)
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had to stash anything in here yet But the opening will be great for whatever small things you might need to stash. Weather it's for traveling purposes or keeping things on the dl at home. Just throw this in a bucket or toolbox with some other bolts and misc washers/nuts and no one will be the wiser. I might even get another no stash boot just to make it look like I needed boots this big. It is a big bolt.
customer_reviews.author: Jason
